net.beaconcontroller.routing

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beaconcontroller.routing.Link

  • public class Link
extends Object
    Represents a link between two datapaths. It is assumed that Links will generally be held in a list, and that the first datapath's id will be held in a different structure.
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Long dst
      Destination datapath id
      protected Short inPort
      Incoming port number on the dst datapath the link connects to
      protected Short outPort
      Outgoing port number of the current datapath the link connects to
